stars.description: High growth, high market share products requiring significant investment to maintain position
stars.strategy: Invest aggressively to maintain or grow market share

question_marks.description: High growth, low market share products with uncertain potential requiring careful evaluation
question_marks.strategy: Selectively invest or divest based on strategic fit

cash_cows.description: Low growth, high market share products generating consistent profits with minimal investment
cash_cows.strategy: Maximize cash generation to fund Stars and Question Marks

dogs.description: Low growth, low market share products consuming resources without significant returns
dogs.strategy: Divest or minimize investment to free up resources
